title: Manage Refinery Alarm Rationalization
description: A control systems engineer analyzes the performance of the plant's alarm system to identify 'bad actors' (frequently occurring or nuisance alarms) and rationalize them.

tasks.description: Run a report on alarm frequency for the entire refinery over the last month.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is generated, listing the top 10 most frequent alarms.

tasks.description: Investigate the top alarm, a 'low flow' alarm on a pump, to determine its cause.
tasks.expected_outcome: The investigation reveals the alarm's setpoint is too close to the pump's normal operating point, causing it to trigger unnecessarily.

tasks.description: Submit a management of change (MOC) request to adjust the alarm's setpoint to a more appropriate value.
tasks.expected_outcome: An MOC is created to formally review and approve the change to the alarm setting.
